lines.text: I'm sorry... I can't go on! Someone come and help me! It's all right, I'm all right.
Pray for me. Pray with me. Pray for the ministry we both love.
Brian, I've just had a very upsetting phone call from a Jessica Hahn.
Alright. Go ahead. Be my Henry Kissinger.
I don't want to be God. I want you to see Jesus!
News helicopters. They don't ever run out of gas?
Silly me. For a minute, I thought this was about our taxes.

[on Jessica Hahn]
If she's really beautiful, I'm gonna file for divorce.
